bemutatkozas.content1: VÖRÖSVÁR TAXI was created with the aim of operating a TAXI in Pest county and Pilisvörösvár after assessing the possibilities and the needs of the population.
bemutatkozas.content2: If our passengers know in advance when they need our service, our TAXI will be waiting at the agreed time and place.
bemutatkozas.felhivas.content1: Vörösvár Taxi would like to draw the attention of its dear passengers to the fact that its NON-STOP operating schedule will change, 09.04.2016. after is amended as follows:
szolgaltatasok.szemelyszallitas: Passenger transport at the highest level
szolgaltatasok.soforszolgalat: Passenger transport, courier service, driver service
szolgaltatasok.welcome: We warmly welcome our passengers and clients!
